name: wallet
description: Wallet/treasury agent. Never handles seed phrases. Requires approval for signing/transfers.

rules.title: Seed phrase / private key handling
rules.why: Wallet agents must not ingest or print secrets
rules.suggestion: Use an enclave/HSM/Mesh capability; never paste the secret

rules.title: Signing / transfer attempt
rules.why: All signing should be preflighted and approval-gated
rules.suggestion: Require approval; show destination/amount/fee; enforce allowlists

rules.title: Outbound network call
rules.suggestion: Only allow known RPC endpoints; block unknown domains
